text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product specification:
Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant, Copper Revival Finish with Satin Etched Glass

Product keywords:
Shade Material: Etched glass.
Shade Color: Satin. 
Distressed: No.
Number of Lights: 1
Connection: Hardwired. 
Plug-In: No. 
Chain or Rod Length: 12".
10 feet of Wire
Requires One Medium A-Line 100-watt maximum bulb
Three Interconnecting 12-Inch stems Included
For Additional Decorative Chain Order: 9100-777
For Additional Stem Order: 9199-777
Canopy Included

Product description:
text.Response A:
Attention: Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant commands your attention with its Copper Revival Finish and Satin Etched Glass.

Interest: The Mini Pendant heightens the aesthetic appeal of your home, while providing functional lighting. The shade material is etched glass, which diffuses the light from the bulb, preventing glare. One light is suitable over a small dining table, in a bathroom, or as accent lighting.

Desire: This Mini Pendant will be a great addition to your home. You will enjoy the aesthetic appeal and functionality for years to come.

Action: Click ‘Add to Cart’ to purchase the Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolis One-Light Mini Pendant today.
text.Response B: Introducing the Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolitan One-Light Mini Pendant in the Copper Revival finish with satin etched glass. This pendant light features a sleek design with a copper finish and satin etched glass that will add a touch of modern style to any room in your home. The light is designed with a single light source, making it ideal for task lighting in a kitchen or dining room. The pendant light comes with three interconnecting 12-inch stems, allowing you to customize the length to your exact needs. The shade material is etched glass, providing a warm and inviting glow. The light is hardwired and does not come with a plug, so you will need to connect it to a power source. The canopy is included, and the chain length is 12 inches. You can easily extend the chain to the desired length by ordering additional stems through the numbers listed above. The Sea Gull Lighting Metropolitan collection is a great choice for those who are looking for high-quality lighting solutions that are both stylish and functional. With its sleek design and durable construction, this pendant light will provide years of service. Add a touch of modern style to your home with the Sea Gull Lighting 61035-777 Metropolitan One-Light Mini Pendant.
